page.title: 07MILLBAY
page.content: This area of the city with the area to the north of it has been neglected for many years. The general shabby appearance is only now being changed by some redevelopment of the Union Street site. The{Millbay Docks}was an old{G.W.R.}Dock which belonged later to the Transport Docks Board. After a period of decline the dock has developed a Ferry Terminal to cope with Ferry traffic to France and Spain. The Ferry operator is{Brittany {Ferries }and enormous tourist trade has been generated through the Dock, so that a second Roll on Roll off bridge is now being built. The ferry was originally started to carry freight and the import / export of fruit, fish, shellfish, vegetables and meat has increased greatly.
